title: Audio Source
description: A source for audio data referenced in Audio Emitters Audio can be referenced by URI or `bufferView` index. `mimeType` is required when `bufferView` is used.

uri.description: The uri of the audio file.
uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the audio file. Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.

mimeType.description: The audio's MIME type. Required if `bufferView` is defined. Unless specified by another extension, the only supported mimeType is `audio/mpeg`.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the audio data. Use this instead of the audio source's uri property.
